doc:
Lorna Gray https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lorna_Gray 0 Lorna Gray (July 26, 1917 – April 30, 2017) was an American film actress known for her comic roles, and later as a villainess. She is best known for her roles in Columbia Pictures comedy shorts and Republic Pictures serials. She was known as Adrian Booth since 1945. Lorna_Gray ( July_26_,_1917 – April_30_,_2017 ) was an_American_film_actress known for her_comic_roles , and later as a_villainess . She is_best_known for her_roles in Columbia_Pictures_comedy_shorts and Republic_Pictures_serials . She was_known as Adrian_Booth since 1945 .
